ygData.subject: Re: Eerie Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: Encore Encore! Very nice!!!! Koden ... From: Morgan Allison  To:  Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 10:10 AM Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
Encore Encore! Very nice!!!!

Koden
----- Original Message -----
From: Morgan Allison <morgan@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 10:10 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Eerie Kithicor


> From: "Morgan Allison" <morgan@...>
>
> As a bard, I have been working on some ballads to perform for others.
This
> si my latest one that I thought I would share with the group. I don't
mind
> if you use it. I think part of a Bard's job is to spread the works of
others
> as well as create works of their own. I do that myself, and I try to give
> credit to the original poet if I know who it is. Anyway, here it is:
>
>
> In the deep, dark wood
> Of eerie Kithicor
> See the bixies flit about
> Hear the horrible kodiak roar
>
> In the deep, dark wood
> Of eerie Kithicor
> The halflings play in their cool glen
> Not far from Highhold Pass's door
>
> In the deep, dark wood
> Of eerie Kithicor
> Settlers proud and noble died
> Defending us from zombie hordes
>
> In the deep, dark wood
> Of eerie Kithicor
> Abandoned, burned and haunted homes
> Remnants of the things they wore
>
> In the deep, dark wood
> Of eerie Kithicor
> An undead ghoul took my friend's life
> Now it's time to settle the score
>
> In the deep, dark wood
> Of eerie Kithicor
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Give back to your community through "Grow to Give."
> http://www.onelist.com
> See homepage for details.
>
